Today in Moray, it's looking solid with 3 ft @ 8s E swell and a moderate 11 mph S wind. Best spots include Fraserburgh and West Point, both offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, expect a drop to 1 ft @ 7s ENE, making it a quiet day across the coast. The day after, surf picks back up to 3 ft @ 8s E with light 9 mph S winds, keeping it fun at spots like Fraserburgh and Pennan. Best: today.
